name: No Bake Mango Beet Cream Pie
description: Gluten, Soy, Refined Oil free recipe. Nut-free option. Single Serve
recipeIngredient: 3 Tablespoons ground raw almond (I grind a bunch of nuts every few days)
a few drops of water/agave if needed
1/2  medium beet  (or 1 small beet peeled and grated)
2 Tablespoons raw sugar/coconut sugar/sweetener of choice
Spices: pinch of cinnamon, ginger, cloves, all spice(optional)

itemListElement.text: Pulse the ground almonds, dates and coconut together until dates are well combined and mixture sticks together when pressed.
itemListElement.name: Pulse the ground almonds, dates and coconut together until dates are well combined and mixture sticks together when pressed.

itemListElement.text: Add the rice krispies to the mixture and give it 1 pulse to coarsely break up some.
itemListElement.name: Add the rice krispies to the mixture and give it 1 pulse to coarsely break up some.

itemListElement.text: Knead the mixture for a few seconds to release some of the coconut oil which will help bring it together.
itemListElement.name: Knead the mixture for a few seconds to release some of the coconut oil which will help bring it together.

itemListElement.text: Add a few drops of water or non dairy milk or agave to help stick well, if needed.
itemListElement.name: Add a few drops of water or non dairy milk or agave to help stick well, if needed.

itemListElement.text: Press the crust on a 4.5 inch tart pan. and Freeze while you prep the cream filling.
itemListElement.name: Press the crust on a 4.5 inch tart pan. and Freeze while you prep the cream filling.

itemListElement.text: Blend the mango, ground raw cashew and water to a smooth mousse consistency and keep. Add raw sugar/sweetener of choice if the mango is not very ripe.
itemListElement.name: Blend the mango, ground raw cashew and water to a smooth mousse consistency and keep. Add raw sugar/sweetener of choice if the mango is not very ripe.

itemListElement.text: Blend 3-4 strawberries with a Tbsp ground cashew.
itemListElement.name: Blend 3-4 strawberries with a Tbsp ground cashew.

itemListElement.text: Grate the beet, and add to blender. Blend with ground cashew, coconut flakes, raw sugar, spices and water into a smooth puree.
itemListElement.name: Grate the beet, and add to blender. Blend with ground cashew, coconut flakes, raw sugar, spices and water into a smooth puree.

itemListElement.text: Pour puree in a pan and bring to a boil on low heat, to cook the beet and thicken the mixture. Cook for another 3-4 minutes after the boil, until it thickens and does not taste raw. Let cool a bit.
itemListElement.name: Pour puree in a pan and bring to a boil on low heat, to cook the beet and thicken the mixture. Cook for another 3-4 minutes after the boil, until it thickens and does not taste raw. Let cool a bit.

itemListElement.text: Take the crust out. Layer the mango and beet cream to preference, marble or swirl it.
itemListElement.name: Take the crust out. Layer the mango and beet cream to preference, marble or swirl it.

itemListElement.text: You can top with some finely chopped mango too.
itemListElement.name: You can top with some finely chopped mango too.

itemListElement.text: Freeze for 2-3 hours. Serve when firm.
itemListElement.name: Freeze for 2-3 hours. Serve when firm.
